Uses of Package
javax.portlet.annotations

  • Packages that use javax.portlet.annotations 
    Package Description
    javax.portlet.annotations
    This describes a proposed extension for the JSR 362 Portlet Specification 3.0 public API to exploit CDI capabilities in portlets.
  • Classes in javax.portlet.annotations used by javax.portlet.annotations 
    Class and Description
    PortletSerializable
    This interface must be implemented by PortletStateScoped beans in order to allow the bean portlet container to intialize the bean at the beginning of a request and passivate the bean at the end of the request.
    PortletURLGenerationListener.URLType
    Needed for V2.0 portlets to discern between a Render URL and an Action URL since both are represented by the interface PortletURL.
    URLFactory.Copy
    Specifies processing when a URL is created.
